channel.title: Starting location

item.title: Starting location
item.dc:creator: @Teutobod Teutobod
item.description:
@Teutobod wrote:

i DELETED my player.java (ill copy it back)
and recompiled and run the server,started a new acc, and its in edge!!!LoL

EDIT:
zez1
its in lumby try it.if u type ::tele 3222 3222 u’ll be in lumby.

EDIT2:
i opened client.java and found the old coords at:" if player dies"…
and changed it to 3222 3222 but when im dying i start in edge.

Read full topic

item.description:

Think as if it was a gridded map like thing
You dont just give
Y axis = 3222
x axis=3222

cause like you read the y axis
and the x
there not the same
Unless it says they are o.O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2008, 01:31:25 PM[/size][hr]And keep searching the old pos’s in client.java and player.java and change them or just use Ctrl+h.

item.title: Starting location
item.dc:creator: @zez1ma_boy zez1ma boy
item.description:
@zez1ma_boy wrote:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 3222;//3222;
teleportToY = 3222;//3222;

ahh go to lumy and type ::mypos

change teleporttox to the x pos and teleporttoy to the y pos …

item.title: Starting location
item.dc:creator: @Teutobod Teutobod
item.description:
@Teutobod wrote:

i have pimpscape client,my starting point is edge bank.

i opened the player.java and changed this:
// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3222;//3222; teleportToY = 3222;//3222;

compiled again,but when i make a new account im starting in edgeville bank and not in 3222;3222 (lumby)
any1 know how can i do it?plz tell me
